review: Doctor's explanation:Very polite. Diagnoses the problem correctly and explains the prognosis of the problem very clearly,in a plain and lucid manner.Medical treatment/recovery:Never gives false hopes of recovery. Explains the course of treatment properly, with medicines which are only necessary. Always tells an estimated time for recovery, amd gives special attention to exercises, posture care and other daily-life activities that may worsen the problem.Things I liked about the doctor:1) Politeness2) Power of explaining the prognosis very clearly3) Never imposes unnecessary lab tests or imaging.4) Always recommends a routine blood checkup to analyse the overall health of the patient.5) Recovery starts exactly as estimated by the doctor.
Very friendly and helpful. His staffs are also very friendly. Explained my condition in details and also explained the precautions that I need to take in details as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
It was really nice and I had contacted him for 2 times for my father who is above 80 years old. He is fine now. Thank You
Regards
Krishnendu Saha
1st visit good experience, getting all relevant queries. Next visit for showing the pathological report no option shown in Practo. Would request to arrange for the same with discounting.

review: The doctor was polite and soft-spoken. I was there for my mom's osteoarthritis problem, as she couldn't walk. He explained the issue nicely and offered a swift and focused response!
Very cordial and listens to patient carefully. Explains the causes and remedies. Certainly a very good doctor

The doctor is amazing. Helped treat my injury with minimal medicines and tests. Listened to ask the problems carefully and i got well following his simple remedies. However, Even though the doctor is very good and very friendly but you have to pay only in cash, practo appointments don't hold any value and every time you have to pay a registration fee of 150 which is valid for only 15 days. This is over and above the visitation fee

Nice experience, very pleasing personality.
Explained condition lucidly. 
Very satisfied. 
Thank you Doctor.
Doctor's Communication, Explanation about the my health-issues and how to take the medicines prescribed by him.

review: Due to my grandmother's health condition it was difficult to take her for a face to face check up.But the video consultation with Dr.Sarkar was really helpful and informative. Sir listened to all the problems and then shared his opinion in a very structured and easy to understand way. The follow up consultation was also very helpful,he contacted me after reviewing my grandmother's x-ray reports for suggesting on the next course of actions. Thank you sir

I had pain in my shoulder but there is no relief. 
He has written test for blood test 5000 for shoulder pain.
Fully satisfied, he diagnosed very thoroughly, he explained the situation very good......he is polite

His diagnosis is on point.He cured my uncle's feet and now I an consulting my aunt's knee problems with him.He is friendly and really listens to any problem that the patient has to say about his or her suffering.I would definitely recommend him.
